text:
Join Donald Abrams at #CannX2018! He was the President of the @Integrativeonc  in 2010 and has been a member of various Education sub-committees of the @ASCO. 
Join his session: The Health Effects of #Cannabis and Cannabinoids, Will Cannabis Cure #Cancer?
